about_the_game:
Karos. Rebirth: Classic Edition is a classic of the MMORPG genre, with an amazing fantasy world in which you will find the most unusual adventures. The variety of locations, a great variety of dungeons and monsters will make you plunge into this world headlong.

The beloved world of Azmara, filled with the confrontation between Light and Darkness, returns in its classic form. This legendary version of the game has absorbed all the best things that Karos heroes have loved over the years. It will bring back your original gaming experience and give you the opportunity to take a personal look at the origins of the famous MMORPG and remember how it was used to be. Choose one of four original races, fight for a better future and write your name in the history of your native lands.

FEATURES

- An ideal opportunity to indulge your nostalgia for your favorite game, untouched by years and updates.

​- Four unique races and many classes, each of which can be developed by choosing additional specializations.

- Intuitive game: no difficulties in mastering.

- PvP at every turn: castle sieges, mine captures, endless battles in the open world.

- Variety of PvE content: raid bosses, many dungeons of varying degrees of difficulty, which can be completed either alone or with a reliable team.

- Interesting Flett system: get the energy of fallen monsters to create powerful equipment that will improve along with your character.

- Mounts turn into beautiful accessories when you walk, and your little pet friends are able to grow and develop.

- Low system requirements.

Years passed, Karos changed, became better, updated. Today, many things look completely different from those in the distant years when we were just launching this legendary MMORPG. And now we are pleased to present you Karos. Rebirth: Classic Edition. It will take you back to the very beginnings of the Karos world and show you what the game looked like at the time of its inception.

name: Karos Classic

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7, 8.1, 10, 11
  • Processor: Intel Pentium 4 1.8 Ghz or more
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 5600 or similar
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7, 8.1, 10, 11
  • Processor: CPU Intel® CoreTM 2 Duo E6700(2.66Ghz) or more
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics GeForce FX6200 / Radeon 9600 or more
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

short_description: The living legend returns in his original form! The Сlassic version of Karos. Rebirth, untouched by years and updates. Maximum level, sharpening level is limited.
supported_languages:
English*, Russian*, Turkish*, German*, Spanish - Spain*, French*, Polish*, Portuguese - Portugal*, Portuguese - Brazil*, Spanish - Latin America*
*languages with full audio support
